level.text: No vending vehicle, including any display on or attachments to the vehicle allowed by this section, shall exceed the followings dimensions unless otherwise authorized by the DCRA Director:
Eighteen feet six inches (18 ft. 6 in.) in length;
Eight feet (8 ft.) in width; and
Ten feet six inches (10 ft. 6 in) in height, measured from bottom of the tire.
No food, merchandise, or equipment shall be hung or otherwise displayed from the non-serving side or back of the vending vehicle.

All food, merchandise, and equipment, other than the serving window flap or awning shall be firmly attached to the body of the vending vehicle and shall not project more than twelve inches (12 in.) from the body of the vehicle when serving and must be retracted when not serving.
All vending vehicles shall rest on inflated tires.
